Data Type + Length:
Select Distinct IndividualSocialMediaId = c.id
                ,IndividualId = pa.id
                ,[URL] = sm.handle
                ,IndividualSocialMediaTypeId = c.contact_context_id
                ,ContactStatusId = c.contact_status_id
                ,ContactSourceId = c.contact_status_id
                ,VerifiedDate = c.verified_date
				,[CreatedAt] = ISNULL(c.created_at, c.updated_at)
				,[UpdatedAt] = isnull(c.updated_at, c.created_at)
From social_media sm (nolock)
Join Contact c (nolock) on sm.contact_id = c.id
Join party pa (nolock) on c.party_id = pa.id
Join individual i (nolock) on pa.id = i.party_id
Join relationship r (nolock) on r.party_id = pa.id
Join affiliate af (nolock) on r.related_party_id = af.party_id
Join vw_1_affiliate_connect vw (nolock) on vw.affiliatenbr=af.number
Where c.is_deleted = 0
and pa.is_deleted = 0
and pa.party_type_id = 1
and r.relationship_type_id = 1
and pa.is_deleted = 0
